segments.text: How about we taking a tour to Hawaii ? I have a 2 - weeks ' vacation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds fantabulous . I have dreamed of going there for months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me , too . Why don't we get ready now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I don't want to waste even a minute .
segments.speaker: S2
